Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC television! Totally awesome!
Reviews.Author: Flowers
Reviews.Content: I can not say enough about Panasonic! YOU CAN NOT buy a better television. The picture is so clear, so sharp and so life like it is almost unbelieveable! NEVER be afraid to purchase any Panasonic Viera model, you will not be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: reflects everything
Reviews.Author: Gary & Sondra  Nixon
Reviews.Content: This TV reflects everything . It is a real disappointment ,you cant see the picture if you watch in daytime , if watching at night turn all lights out. It really sucks.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Stephen K Zink
Reviews.Content: Great TV.  Excellent picture. No sound bar needed. I want a bigger TV, but am afraid to switch because this TV is so good.
